name: JACS Cryptographic Provenance
description: Add post-quantum cryptographic signatures to all agent communications

keyAlgorithm.description: Cryptographic algorithm for signing (pq2025 recommended for quantum resistance)

autoSign.description: Deprecated no-op in moltyjacs. Use jacs_sign explicitly or host transport middleware/adapters for automatic signing.

verificationClaim.description: Verification claim level. 'unverified' = basic self-signed, 'verified' = DNS verified, 'verified-hai.ai' = HAI.ai registered

haiApiUrl.description: HAI.ai API endpoint for registration verification
